department: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development
description: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is seeking procurement services for the International Business Development Branch (BFM), which has a requirement for the professional services of an experienced Procurement Specialist resource to advise, guide and support the procurement activities of the entire Branch for goods and services.
full_summary:
**TSPS Procurement Advisor Senior**
===========================
### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: 23-234213
* **Reference Number**: 23-234213
* **Closing Date**: 2023-01-17 02:00 PM Eastern Standard Saving Time EST
* **Publication Date**: 2023-01-03

### Solicitation Description

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is soliciting proposals from qualified TSPS Supply Arrangement Holders to provide Procurement Advisory Services for the International Business Development Branch (BFM). The requirement is for a Senior Procurement Specialist to provide expert advice, guidance, and support on procurement activities for goods and services.

### Contract Details

* **Estimated Contract Value**: None
* **Contract Duration**: From the date of Contract award to March 31, 2024
* **Option to Extend**: Up to two (2) additional one (1) year periods
* **Security Requirements**: A valid Facility Security Clearance at the level of SECRET and personnel security screening at the level of SECRET

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) compliant suppliers.

### Contact Information

* **Authority Contractante**: Assane Ndiaye
* **Phone**: 613-791-7185
* **Email**: [assane.ndiaye@international.gc.ca](mailto:assane.ndiaye@international.gc.ca)

### Notice Type

Demande de propositions

### Method of Procurement

Competitive - Selective tendering

### NIBS Description

R019BF - Services aux ressources humaines; Services-conseil en affaire /Services de gestion du changement; Service de gestion de projets

### Contracting Entity

Ministère des Affaires étrangères, développement et commerce

Security clearance notice to contractors: All contractors must hold a valid Facility Security Clearance at the level of SECRET and their personnel must be cleared to SECRET or TOP SECRET level before being allowed access to PROTECTED/CLASSIFIED information.

### Timeframe

Deadline: 2023-01-17 02:00 PM Eastern Standard Saving Time EST

Please ensure that if the notice falls within the bounds of the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (AECG), you include the special requirements in the description.
Duration of contract: 2023-04-01 to 2024-
